name: jitploy
description: service that manages deployment of others services

scripts.start: npm install -g jitploy && jitploy -V && echo "THIS IS HOW YOU DO"
scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push && echo "PUSH IT REAL GOOD!"
scripts.test: echo "Error: I wanna know what test is, I WANT YOU TO SHOW ME"

author: Paul Beaudet
